member.name: T:HanZombieRiotS2.IHanZriotAPI
member.summary: Han Zombie Riot API. Han 僵尸暴动 API.

member.name: P:HanZombieRiotS2.IHanZriotAPI.GameStart
member.summary: Get GameStart. 获取游戏开始状态.

member.name: P:HanZombieRiotS2.IHanZriotAPI.CurrentDay
member.summary: Get CurrentDay. 获取当前天数.

member.name: P:HanZombieRiotS2.IHanZriotAPI.NeedKillZombie
member.summary: Get NeedKillZombie. 获取当前需要击杀多少只丧尸.

member.name: P:HanZombieRiotS2.IHanZriotAPI.ZombieKill
member.summary: Get ZombieKill. 获取当前所有玩家已经击杀了多少只丧尸.

member.name: P:HanZombieRiotS2.IHanZriotAPI.ZombiesLeft
member.summary: Get ZombiesLeft. 获取还剩余多少只丧尸通关.

member.name: P:HanZombieRiotS2.IHanZriotAPI.HumansAlive
member.summary: Get HumansAlive. 获取当前存活人类数量.

member.name: P:HanZombieRiotS2.IHanZriotAPI.MaxDay
member.summary: Get MaxDay. 获取当前地图最大关卡天数.

member.name: M:HanZombieRiotS2.IHanZriotAPI.ZRiot_Human(SwiftlyS2.Shared.Players.IPlayer)
member.summary: change player to human. 指定某个玩家成为人类.

member.name: M:HanZombieRiotS2.IHanZriotAPI.ZRiot_Zombie(SwiftlyS2.Shared.Players.IPlayer)
member.summary: change player to human. 指定某个玩家成为丧尸.
